Plintissa followed Iron Raptor to the Lion and Dragon room......
----- Original Message -----
From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 20, 2000 3:15 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> * Iron Raptor looked at Plintissa...*
>
> " He's right, there could be an attack at any cycle. If you want you can
> come with me to the Lion and Dragon room after I'v done a little something
> to enhance our odds of winning,"
>
> *Turns back towards the screen and attachs herself online again. The star
> appearers again, it's points stretch and contract as Iris speaks again.*
> Iris: " That was a short nap. Decided about my upgrade yet?"
> *Iron Raptor shakes her head.*
> " This is to serious a time now, Iris. I need you to download into the
Arks
> major system and run yourself off of my energy cell."
> Iris: " And what does that mean, you'r gunna run an extension cord from
> yourself to me while you fight?"
> * Iron Raptor snarls.*
> " Remember, you're a separate system. I'm just going to download you into
> the Ark and leave an energy cell behind for you. Nothing complicated.
> Although, you will have to dormant until someone calls you up for you to
> start running the defence systems. In simple words, you'r our back up
plan."
> Iris:"So if the Ark starts to run low on power and it's defence systems
> start to go offline then someone can call me up and then get the Ark to
run
> it's systems off me?"
> * Iron Raptor nodded then quickly downloaded Iris onto the Ark's main
> system, she then detached herself and smiled when the star remained on the
> screen.*
> " Alright now, I'm going to put you on sleep mode. Any sign that the Ark
is
> in serious trouble...activate."
> *Iron Raptor typed in a few codes and the screen went blank, she then took
a
> round tube of energy from herself and placed it behind the screen. Still
> attached was the cord connecting to the screen for the power to activate
> Iris.
> Iron Raptor turned to Tigerhawk...*
> " Remember that, if the Ark starts to loose power fast just ask for Iris
and
> she'll start running the systems on her own.If you want, it's up to you."
> * Iron Raptor turns and begins to walk towards the door, she had to check
> something out in the Lion and Dragon room before the battle began. There
was
> something that she needed to know.*
>
>
